insert into gen_create_table_history()
select #{item.id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.proId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.tableName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.tableComments, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldAlias, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.isPrimary, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldLength, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{item.fieldDecimal, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{item.fieldDefaultValue, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.fieldIsNull, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.sort, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{item.createBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate, jdbcType = DATE}, #{item.updateBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate, jdbcType = DATE}, #{item.delFlag, jdbcType = DATE} from dual
